mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.tender_id FROM hyjf_coupon_recover r INNER JOIN hyjf_borrow_tender_cpn cpn ON r.tender_id = cpn.nid INNER JOIN hyjf_coupon_tender t ON r.tender_id = t.order_id INNER JOIN hyjf_coupon_user u ON t.coupon_grant_id = u.id INNER JOIN hyjf_coupon_config c ON u.coupon_code = c.coupon_code WHERE ( c.repay_time_config = 2 OR ( cpn.tender_type = 3 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT id FROM hyjf_coupon_real_tender t1 WHERE t1.coupon_tender_id = cpn.nid AND t1.real_tender_id IS NOT NULL ) ) ) AND r.recover_time <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) AND r.recover_status = 0 AND r.received_flg = 1
